title: Taylor Made
description: WHERE THERE'S A WILL, THERE'S NO WAY TO WEDDepartment-store tycoon Alexander Fortune had become bitter about the unholy state of matrimony after four disastrous marriages. To protect his four sons, Alex dictated that if any of them was foolish enough to marry, he'd be cut off from the Fortune fortune.Only one Fortune bachelor remained--shy, reclusive Taylor. While his older brothers were basking in wedded bliss, Taylor was basking in millions of dollars. To market his latest invention, a household robot, Taylor hired PR maven Ali Spencer. Slick, sexy, stylish Ali soon had his head spinning--and not with ideas about Homer, the robot! Ali planned to turn him into the suave Fortune Man. Sure, Taylor was hot for Ali, but he suspected that it was the tailor-made man that Ali craved--not Taylor.
author: Elise Title
